description:
A kingdom simulation game where you immigrate to an imaginary kingdom and enjoy a life of freedom.
It is your chance to visit a fantastical virtual kingdom that lets you travel wherever you wish to go... 
Through beautiful woods, rivers, farms, pastures, mines, schools, churches, and castles. 
But that's not all—the lives of the kingdom's residents are also simulated in fine detail.

Players who visit the kingdom will feel as if they are playing an MMORPG as they engage in authentic conversations with its inhabitants.
They'll be able to find a boyfriend or girlfriend, get married, and have children... And even those children can have children of their own.
The lives that players lead in this kingdom are unique to them and will be totally different with every playthrough. 
This is so much more than a typical game—it is an experience that will stay in your heart as a cherished memory forever.
name: WorldNeverland - Elnea Kingdom
